lines: Good evening. Sebastian. Charmed, I'm sure.
Valentin has impeccable taste in both literature and pastries.
His erdbeerstrudel is legendary. I've been looking forward to this.
introduction.notebookNote: Sebastian is refined and cultured. Appreciates Valentin's taste in food and books.

lines: What an extraordinary overreaction. Though I suppose Valentin has always been... theatrical.
I was examining his collection of early German poetry. Quite impressive, actually.
The dessert? I glanced at it earlier. Admirable presentation. Very precise technique.
followUpLines: This lockdown is rather excessive for a missing pastry, don't you think?
Though I suppose it's valuable to him. Sentimentality and all that.
I prefer to remain above such... base conflicts.
postIncident.notebookNote: Sebastian was examining poetry books. Noticed the strudel's presentation and technique. Dismissive of Valentin's reaction.

lines: Ah, you're conducting a proper investigation. How refreshing.
I observed something curious. The plate was immaculate - no crumbs, no residue.
Someone with considerable attention to detail cleaned it. Almost compulsively.
followUpLines: That level of cleanliness suggests guilt, wouldn't you say?
Or perhaps just refined sensibilities. Hard to tell.
I notice such things. Patterns. Order. Details others miss.
postIncident.notebookNote: Sebastian noticed the plate was suspiciously clean - compulsively so. He seems proud of his observational skills.

lines: Your investigative method is quite sound. I can provide additional data.
Emma exhibited classic guilty behavior - averted gaze, defensive posture.
She was near the table longer than she admits. I observed her from the fiction section.
followUpLines: Body language reveals more than words, don't you think?
She kept glancing at the strudel, then looking away. Fascinating.
Internal conflict between desire and propriety. Textbook.
postIncident.notebookNote: Sebastian claims Emma showed guilty body language and lingered near the table. Clinical observation or calculated misdirection?

lines: *adjusts collar* Very well. I shall confess with precision.
I consumed approximately 40% of the remaining strudel. I measured it mentally.
My method was systematic - I cut clean portions, savored each layer, cleaned the plate afterward.
followUpLines: The craftsmanship was exceptional. Each bite revealed new dimensions.
When I arrived, roughly 30% was already missing. Three distinct cutting patterns.
This was a crime of collective indulgence. I was simply the most thorough.
postIncident.notebookNote: Sebastian confesses to eating 40% of the strudel with methodical precision. Claims 30% was already gone with three cutting patterns. He's the most detailed culprit.
